title: DC challenges Trump’s troop deployment
shortDescription: Officials in Washington, D.C., filed a lawsuit against the Trump administration, alleging his National Guard deployment violates federal law.

title: NY AG appeals Trump's $500 million fraud case to state's highest court
shortDescription: New York Attorney General Letitia James filed an appeal over a half-billion-dollar real estate fraud penalty against President Donald Trump.

title: RFK Jr. grilled at Senate hearing over CDC firings
shortDescription: Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. was grilled at a Senate hearing over recent CDC firings and his vaccine guidance.

title: Donald Trump suggests deploying National Guard in New Orleans
shortDescription: President Donald Trump suggested he may send National Guard troops to New Orleans rather than Chicago as part of his expanding crime crackdown.

title: Court blocks Trump’s $2 billion funding cuts to Harvard over free speech
shortDescription: A US federal court has overturned the Trump administration’s decision to cut billions in funding to Harvard University, ruling that the move violates the school’s free speech rights.

title: Rep. Jerry Nadler slams rumors of JFK heir replacing him in Congress
shortDescription: The influential long-serving New York congressman slammed rumors that JFK's grandson Jack Schlossberg may run to replace him in U.S. Congress.

title: DC sues to halt Trump's National Guard deployment in capital
shortDescription: The DC government sued the Trump administration to stop the president's deployment of 2,200 National Guard troops in the capital.

title: Did Trump end seven wars? US doesn't get full credit for his list
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he ended seven wars and says people should be focused on that instead of the “Epstein hoax.” What 7 wars does he list?

title: Smithsonian sets up team to respond to Trump administration's demands
shortDescription: A letter Smithsonian Secretary Lonnie Bunch III sent to staff said the institution's "independence is paramount," according to news outlets.

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to save his tariffs – and do so quickly
shortDescription: President Trump is counting on the Supreme Court to save the centerpiece of his economic engine – sweeping tariffs.

title: MAHA road bump: As CDC turmoil continues, Trump hedges bet on vaccines
shortDescription: MAHA activists warned Trump that a move to shield pesticide companies could spell “peril for the Republican majority in the House" in 2026 midterms.

title: Is President Donald Trump a supporter of COVID-19 vaccines? It depends.
shortDescription: Despite now calling on drug companies to 'justify their success' in combating the virus, Trump has been a strong supporter of the vaccine in the past.

title: West Coast states rebuke Trump health moves
shortDescription: California, Oregon and Washington formed the West Coast Health Alliance to counter the Trump's administrations health policies and vaccine guidance.

title: House GOP creates new panel to reinvestigate Jan. 6
shortDescription: House Republicans voted to establish a new GOP-led subcommittee to reinvestigate the events of Jan. 6, despite a previous committee's findings.

title: Harvard wins a round against Trump as judge says funding cut was illegal
shortDescription: Harvard University was handed a win against the Trump administration's efforts to revoke $3 billion in federal funding.

title: Emotional Epstein accusers interrupted by Trump's military jet flyover
shortDescription: The White House said that the fighter jets were participating in maneuvers to honor a fallen Polish army pilot killed in a training exercise.
